resources.string: FirstBuild Terms of Service\nMicrofactory, Inc. and its affiliates (collectively "Microfactory" or "We") provide service and content on Firstbuild.com and all other web properties owned or operated by Microfactory (the "Website") to you subject to the following Terms and Conditions (the "Terms"). We may periodically change the Terms without notice, so please check back from time to time. These Terms of Service constitute a binding agreement between you and Microfactory governing your use of the Website and any/all content represented herein. By using and/or visiting the www.Firstbuild.com Website, or any other Websites owned and operated by Microfactory, you signify you understand and agree to both these Terms of Service and the Microfactory Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into the Microfactory Terms of Service, and is included in the Website. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the Website, including users who contribute information, ideas, and other materials or services on the Website. Only those who agree to and abide by all applicable laws, and to these Terms of Service, are authorized to use the Website. Please read these Terms of Service carefully. If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, please do not use the Website.\nThe Website may contain links to third party websites that are not owned or controlled by Microfactory. Microfactory has no control over, and therefore assumes no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party websites. By using the Website, you specifically release and indemnify Microfactory from any and all liability arising from your use of any third-party website.
